title: HTML-Basics: EXERCISE 1
description:
Create a basic HTML page with: 
 - a title that say: 'Save Coderealm!' 
 - the page should show 'Hello World!'
example:
<!DOCTYPE html> 
 <html> 
  <head> 
   <title> This is the title! </title> 
  </head> 
  <body> 
   Here is some text. 
  </body> 
 </html>

title: Forms and Inputs: EXERCISE 1
description:
Create a form with: 
 - A name field (text) 
 - An email field 
 - A password field 
 - A submit button labeled “Sign in”
example:
<!DOCTYPE html> 
 <html> 
  <head> 
   <title> This is the title! </title> 
  </head> 
  <body> 
   <form> 
    <label for = 'name'> Name </label> 
    <input type = 'text' id = 'name' name = 'username'/> 
    <button type = 'submit'> Send </button> 
   </form> 
  </body> 
 </html>

title: FINAL
description:
Create your own small HTML page about a topic of your choice (e.g. your favourite game, an animal, a hobby). The page should: 
 1. contain at least one heading, one paragraph, one image, one list, one link and one form, 
 2. and have a suitable CSS layout.
